name: The Floofy Escape
description:
You are a cat living in a cat café. you don't want to be there you want to be free. evade the staff of the café and try and find a way out to freedom. 

The Floofy Escape is a student game I worked on as Producer and assistant artist. I worked on pre-productions, level design and created the 3D models and rigged and animated them. were a small team of three and had 12 weeks to create this game from scratch. Other Team members were

 Lead programmer: Tea Russle 

Lead Artist: Cara Gim 

All sounds and all music and sounds were freely sourced and no profit was made from this project.
